Subject: Add a page rank plugins

hi,all

I use heritrix to download page and use lucene to index them.
I have an idea to add a pagerank plugins for heritrix just like Google.

For example, if there are many pages link to page A ,then page A's pagerank
value is higher.

anyone can give some suggestions about this?

ansi
